wikipedia_page.main: Marcus Robinson is a photographer and filmmaker specialising in urban transformation and architecture. He is based in TriBeCa, Lower Manhattan in New York City, although he also occasionally works from his family home in Belfast. Robinson's art is created using different media including photography, film, music and painting.

response: * Marcus Robinson (American football) (born 1975), former American football player
* Marcus Robinson (prisoner), former death row prisoner who had his sentence commuted to life imprisonment following a landmark case in South California, United States
